hadiths.text: Anas (Allah be pleased with him) reported:There happened to pass (a person) with a sacrificial camel by Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) and the rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ رُكُوبِ الْبَدَنَةِ الْمُهْدَاةِ لِمَنِ احْتَاجَ إِلَيْهَا
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to ride the sacrificial animal if necessary
